mapper.select: select movie_code, movie_name, movie_director, movie_show_grade_name, movie_recycle_time, to_char(movie_open_date, 'YYYY.MM.DD') as movie_open_date from (select rownum rn, tt.* from (select * from movie order by movie_code desc) tt) where rn>=#{startNum} and rn<=#{endNum}

select movie_code, movie_name, movie_director, movie_show_grade_name, movie_recycle_time, movie_type1, movie_type2, movie_type3, movie_content, make_nation, appear_actor, movie_evaluat_num, acc_evaluat_score, acc_audience_num, good_num, to_char(movie_open_date, 'YYYY.MM.DD') as movie_open_date from movie where movie_code = #{movie_code}
select * from movie where movie_name like '%'|| #{movie_name} || '%'
mapper.update: update movie set good_num = good_num+#{good} where movie_code=#{movie_code}
